directions: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, onions, garlic, cinnamon stick and saffron. Cover; cook until zucchini is tender and onions are almost tender, stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in tomatoes, parsley and mint. Cool to room temperature. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature.) Mix in lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: 1 pound zucchini (about 4 medium), trimmed, cut diagonally into 1/2-inch slices
12 ounces tomatoes, cored, cut into 1/4-inch wedges
title: Zucchini, Onion and Tomato Salad with Saffron and Cinnamon
